channel.title: Time on filippo.im
channel.description: Recent content in Time on filippo.im

item.title: -\ Book Summary /- Thinking fast and slow, Daniel Kahneman
item.description: ​ “Nothing in life is as important as you think it is, while you are thinking about it” Daniel Kahneman You certainly don’t give Nobel prizes by accident, so in my opinion it’s worth listening to what Daniel Kahneman has to say. His 2011 book, Thinking Fast And Slow, is about the two systems in our brains whose struggle over who’s in charge makes us prone to mistakes and false decisions.

item.title: Time to become better
item.description: ​ Summer finally arrives and it’s already over. Well come on, there’s still quite a while to go before we have to return to the daily grind. We still have a lot of free time to make use of. It’s in free time that one really understands what one wants. Vacation is the noblest time of the year, because it’s the time when one either commits to what he wants with the value he recognizes as prevalent in his life or he doesn’t commit to anything at all and then it’s a fool’s errand.
